name: Ctrl+Plus text zoom fix
description: In Chrome and Safari, Ctrl+Plus fails to resize the text on some sites such as the comment section of TechCrunch and any other site that uses Facebook comments. This userstyle fixes this broken text resizing.
additional_info:
The Ctrl+Plus resizing bug is caused by the use of the -webkit-text-size-adjust:none style on these sites. This style is intended for iPhone and should not be used on websites viewed in desktop browsers. See http://www.456bereastreet.com/archive/201011/beware_of_-webkit-text-size-adjustnone/ for more information about this style.

Updated to include B and I tags, and also to add -ms-text-size-adjust override.
